website_summaries.verdict: If this year's gifts are larger than life or you have a big family and want to keep things as organized as possible, these giant gift bags are the only way to go. A good fit for jumbo size gifts or odd shapes.
pros: Large size takes care of awkward gifts you don't even want to contemplate wrapping
Strong enough to withstand a bit of heft
Comes with 6 bags and 3 kid-friendly prints
Ideal for keeping clutter under the tree to a minimum
cons: Fabric isn't completely opaque and some items might show through

customer_reviews.title: These bags are huge. Way bigger than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are huge. Way bigger than I expected but still works. My son is 6'4" holding one of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Wendilc93

customer_reviews.title: I like these bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are just what I wanted. They are very large so will hold all sorts of awkward gifts. They are not completely opaque, so I'd suggest just adding another garbage bag inside. I used them for adult sleeping bags, so no one will guess what is inside. I also had a child's sleeping bag, so I just altered the bag to fit better. It was very easy - i sewed a new seam all around on the outside and then used a pinking shears to trim off the excess.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: They are BIG!!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these before and was very pleased with them, keep in mind that they are really big. This order a couple of the bags had seams that came apart and they weren't close to full nor did they have heavy items in them. If the bags hadn't of come apart I would have given a 5 star rating. Not all the bags were bad and I was able to fix the ones that came apart so I didn't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Janis J Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Not the bags I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were going to be made of cotton but I was disappointed. They were made of cheap synthetic material that many reusable shopping bags are made from. The bags are huge! You might be able to fit a bicycle in one! I didn’t need huge however.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie F.

customer_reviews.title: Using these every year
customer_reviews.text: These bags are gigantic. But they also work very well. I grew tired of wrapping every single gift under the tree so I wrapped some and threw both wrapped and unwrapped into these giant bags for each individual. The kids were far more excited to find out what was in the bags than they usually are by the mound of gifts under the tree. Added in some bubble wrap to make them all extra full and watched them go to town on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cats won’t destroy this bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Selling point for me is this.... I have 2 young male cats who can NOT leave packages or paper bags alone! This is just the perfect solution for those who have this issue. Last year at Christmas was a devastating mess of paper all over the house every day! These are fabric bags that they could care less about! Thanks so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra bradley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, good quality, convenient & fairly priced just right!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandchildren. Cute, sturdy and large enough to hold all of their presents with ties & name tags. I just wish we had the option to choose the style bags. If so I would have picked all six bags the same (loved those decorated with trees, candy, Christmas ornaments, etc.). We will order again next year as we no longer have the time or energy to wrap all the gifts for the little grands. Great product, great idea! Also, thank you for shipping these right on time for delivery prior to Christmas! Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! Very roomy. With proper care should make it through many holidays. Love skipping the dreaded wrapping followed by the huge bag of discarded paper shreds filling up my garbage can. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: gift bags
customer_reviews.text: omg these bags are huge bigger than I expected them to be , they will absolutely take on a lot of gifts , you can fit a little person in these ,, all a side I did not have a chance to use in 2018 will in 2019, but would recommend them for future Christmas's , you wont be disappointed, adorable love them....
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CLOTH CHRISTMAS BAGS
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fabric and size of these bags! The way the ribbon was threaded through the material made it so easy to close the bag up securely! I’m a grandma that buys too many gifts for my grandkids and these bags saved me from wrapping each gift separately and they thought it was cool that they each got their own big bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Big, but see through
customer_reviews.text: The bags were very big, however, they were a bit see through. They were nice for presents that were huge and hard to wrap, but i still had to cover them before putting in the bag so my kids couldn’t figure out the present.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Angela

customer_reviews.title: NOT LIKE ANY OTHER SANTA SACKS
customer_reviews.text: IN THE PAST I HAVE PURCHASED SANTA SACKS. I FOUND THAT EVEN A LARGE GIFT WOULD NOT FIT IN THE BAG. WHEN I ORDERED THEM FROM AMAZON AND RECIEVED THEM I WAS AMAZED. WOW! WITH 6 GRANDCHILDREN I WILL HAVE NO PROBLEM FITTING THEIR PRESENTS IN THEM. ESPECIALLY BECAUSE I DELIVER THEM. MUCH EASIER FOR ME. YOUR ON MY NEXT CHRISTMAS LIST. THANKS AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the purchase. The bags are very thin and therefore a bit see through but all in all, they got the job done. And since they are reusable, I’m looking forward to using them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, flimsy and not at all like pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description makes these seem like they are made of fabric. Don't be fooled! I don't know what this is, but it's paper thin and when filled with gifts the seams come apart and it's cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: sandieguy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas  gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags for Christmas. I really like the quality of the fabric and the look. If it would be a scale of 1-10 it would be a10
customer_reviews.author: Big  T

customer_reviews.title: Extra large, sturdy, reusable
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I use extra large bags like this for storing Xmas gifts for each person until I can get them wrapped. Glad to have a sturdy, reusable option. There are limited designs, only three different. Since I use one per person in same fam it would have been nice if all were different but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These really large bags are perfect for the Christmas gifts for my grandchildren. I am amazed at how sturdy they are and will be able to use them year after year!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Translucent. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Beware! These are translucent, you can see anything you put inside them very clearly. You'll need to do extra wrapping work if you're going to use them for presents. Cheaply made, not worth the price. There's a lot of glowing reviews which makes me think the quality has changed. Don't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COLORFUL
customer_reviews.text: Will be a nice addition to my wrapping table next year. Large items are a chore to wrap, especially heavy ones and these bags will certainly make that much easier. I am hooked on using all sizes of decorative bags all year for all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: M J Garth

customer_reviews.title: STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags they’re nice, large and sturdy. They look cute & can hold quite a bit of weight. The only thing I didn’t care for was the holes in the top you have to tread ribbon through to-cinch up the top, one of the holes broke by just trying to pull the ribbon to tie the bow. Despite that I would still repurchase these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: Good Bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags were a big hit with the kids, only thing I would like to see changed is a wider tie ribbon. But they are very good and you can put a lot of gifts in them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McKiddie

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton of gifts!!
customer_reviews.text: These holidays sacks were fabulous!! Everyone who came to the house loved them and asked where we purchased them. They were great for keeping everything tidy and secret until Christmas morning. Would highly recommend these for anyone with kids. Well made, hold a ton of gifts and total opaque and cannot see through them at all.
customer_reviews.author: CKH

customer_reviews.title: Held everything with room to spare
customer_reviews.text: The bags came promptly and were what I wanted and needed. I used them instead of wrapping all of the gifts for my adult family members. They were happy to reach deep into the large bags to pull out each item one by one. I had some medium weight items (like tools, Bluetooth speaker, etc) and the bags held up well with no ripping or tearing. These will be used for years to come per my family members’ requests. I only wish they came in red and green for some variety, but the red worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Davies

customer_reviews.title: Make Gift Wrapping Easy as Can Be!
customer_reviews.text: this bag is attractive and HUGE and well made. Perfect solution to all your Holiday wrapping needs. Use it for one very large gift or to hold many smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Stuesser

customer_reviews.title: Great size and reusable!
customer_reviews.text: Received these really quick. Very large and worked great for some of the oversized presents I bought. These large bags made "wrapping" very easy. Cloth like fabric that will be reusable. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: The Cobb's

customer_reviews.title: the best thing goin
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE AND DURABLE... Santa left our children gifts in these this year and they were durable and hold alot of toys and clothes and whatever Santa would want to leave!
customer_reviews.author: SPK SR.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I wanted. I could bundle all my grandkids Christmas presents in them. It made taking them to their house for Christmas much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: Best coordinating bags!
customer_reviews.text: All my kiddos had their own bag! Was so easy to fill, tag and place under our tree. Everyone knew what Santa had brought by reading their name tag.. greatest idea, ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Becki Muncie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandchildren gifts.
customer_reviews.text: These Christmas gift bags are huge! I’m using them to put several wrapped gifts in each for grandchildren. It will be fun and look like a Santa sack.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE BAGS
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing bags. Forget the plastic garbage in the stores these bags are large and tough and reuseable. They are amazing. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Poppinfresh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift bags for the on the go person. Lol
customer_reviews.text: Great holiday bags for those of us who wants to skip the gift wrapping. Simple step: Buy gift, put inside bag, use the pull draw string, attach a holiday tag, place gift under tree or whatever and Bam your done! Easy, Peasy...No wasteful paper wrap or tape to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Great for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Great for Christmas. Saved hours of time from wrapping gifts. Very sturdy as they survived two toddlers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ziccardi

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size and durability. They were also very pretty when tied at the top ! Grandkids reused them to take all their toys home after the visit and that was a test of their strength !
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These are big and sturdy. I am not in physical shape to wrap a bunch of presents for grandchildren this year, so I took everything out of packaging, but it in a bag with a gift tag (included) for each grand child, tied them shut and stuffed them in boxes to ship. Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: stclajm

customer_reviews.title: Playing Santa for Kids
customer_reviews.text: If you have men in your family who love to play sata at christmas time as much as the men in our family then these large christmas bags are the perfect thing. We love going to the local shelters and seeing the kids faces light up with joy when they see santa come through the door with these big bags on his back filled with goodies for the kids. Worth every penny when you see a little one smile.
customer_reviews.author: KanY D

customer_reviews.title: These bags are absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are absolutely awesome! Extremely sturdy and hold very big items such as a microwave. Really love them. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Peachie from Philly

customer_reviews.title: These bags were a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are made of a heavy cloth and are very practical. Everyone loved them at Christmas amd used them ti oack up all their presents (theae things are HUGE!). I highly recommend them for large and awkward presents
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: These are huge but perfect for Christmas since my kids travel home for the holidays
customer_reviews.author: Deonna Fields

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Strong, decorative, and easy to use!! Durable even for the heavier gifts! Makes those hard to wrap gifts very festive and secret until opened!! Excellent quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Buckstone

customer_reviews.title: Giant Christmas gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them. I wish I had ordered more. I get compliments andvasied where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I FOUND THAT THESE CHRISTMAS BAGS ARE GREAT. THEY CAME IN HANDY WITH DELIVERING OUR 100 GIFT BAGS TO ASSISTANT LIVING RESIDENCE. HOPE I CAN GET ANOTHER 6 FOR A MORE REASONABLE PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: EOP

customer_reviews.title: high quality and great colors
customer_reviews.text: There are absolutely no negatives about this product! The gift bags were great and far surpassed my expectations. The quality was much higher than previous gift bags I have purchased. Rave reviews also from recipients and definitely reusable for next year
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive. Great time saver - don't have to wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Cosi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday Bag!
customer_reviews.text: These huge bags are fantastic! A Christmas bag that can be packed like Santa Claus did it himself!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved these bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were more than I expected. Made well, sturdy and attractive for my Christmas gifts. I will reuse them next year for large toys and/or other gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Barrile

customer_reviews.title: Christmas wrapping done easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! They are so convenient for Christmas wrapping!
customer_reviews.author: P. REYNOLDS

customer_reviews.title: Really better than plastic bike bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. Very good material and great for holding many boxes and bags of presents !! Got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M.

customer_reviews.title: These Bags Are Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were absolutely perfect. I will be getting them every year. They are much larger then I expected. Best Buy I’ve done this Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dallascb1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for very large and/or multiple gifts.Bought two packages for a total of twelve bags..
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality material, but very large for big or awkwardly shaped presents.
customer_reviews.author: RHAUCK

customer_reviews.title: Loved these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice and especially for the small amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fabric bags—large enough to enclose tall Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.text: These giant bags totally exceeded my expectations. The fabric was very high quality, and the size was perfect! Three of our grandchildren received large pieces of rolling luggage and the youngest received a plasma car as a riding toy. I have packed the bags to reuse for next year larger gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Santa Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for big “Santa bags” everywhere. Finally found these bags and they were just what I was looking for! I used the bags to carry wrapped presents to my parents place. They held a lot of gifts and were very sturdy, no signs of tearing or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge gift sacks
customer_reviews.text: These are spacious sacks. I was able to fit each child's presents per sack.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good but too big for my needs
customer_reviews.text: They were bigger than I could use so I had to return them. However, they seemed very sturdy and worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great strong quality item - repeat purchase-great way to deliver your gifts 🎁! I will buy again for future Christmas’s!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Yonaitis

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: We are providing Christmas for 45 needy kids this Christmas and these bags are awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Queen

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Using the product to separate all the Christmas gifts by Family and then the kids will have a way to haul home their presents.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Ewald

customer_reviews.title: Large bags
customer_reviews.text: These are very big. Perfect to use for each kid on Christmas to put all their gifts in.
customer_reviews.author: AmznSh0ppr

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Needed a large bag for stuffed animal and couldn’t find correct size in stores. I ended up getting 6 for the price of two. Gift tags included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love them and the quality i can’t wait for my kids to open their sacks on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy gift bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome. It was more than I expected. I was more surprised than anything and I highly recommend them for gift items.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags that I receive where one the bags had a hole in the bottom. I was needing these bags for a party this past weekend, so I had to purchase some more elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedez

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome! I put each grandkids gifts in their own bag! They love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna French

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Giant Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags were very sturdy & held our big items PLUS can be used again and again. Loved them
customer_reviews.author: mary b sheridan

customer_reviews.title: can't wait to use them
customer_reviews.text: Great size seems strong. I haven't used them yet due to it being May but I'm not worried it would do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to wrap a firepit. Very nice bag. Even tho my measurements were wrong. The box was still to lage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-So product
customer_reviews.text: The product was okay. The material is not what I expected. For what I need them for they will work, but the bags are definitely not gift quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Great size and great quality. I'm very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dugan

customer_reviews.title: All alike, bought 2 packs and they're all the same. Drawstring is flimsy and there arent any grommets, just hes in the fabric
customer_reviews.text: They're big but could be taller and you could fit alot more toys in it. Each grandchild gets a filled-up bag of wrapped gifts this year. 6 grandkids. Im toast.
customer_reviews.author: Vlc

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Strong enough, worked great for the luggage I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Santa bags
customer_reviews.text: These Santa bags are awesome! They hold a lot!! It made bringing presents to my nieces and nephews so much more exciting!!
customer_reviews.author: mod

customer_reviews.title: Great bags.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags. I will be able to use them several years.
customer_reviews.author: L Sal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the wiggle ride on cars I got for the great nieces and nephews!!!
customer_reviews.author: dawn walsh

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: The bags are huge! Perfect for large or odd shaped gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and able to use next year
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for large Christmas gifts for the Grandchildren - Love that they can be used again next year !
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Elrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Solutions for Hard to Wrap Gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty and practical bags. The service was also great.
customer_reviews.author: vkd

customer_reviews.title: ... was only 3 in the package and not 6 like the details say
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom and she was so excited to get them but when I received them there was only 3 in the package and not 6 like the details say
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie geraghty

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: The bags are indeed giant and of good quality. They are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: TaKori

customer_reviews.title: One had a small hole but I stapled it and it worked
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them and will order again next year
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hand

customer_reviews.title: Second year buying these bags
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed with the quality of these bags last year when they arrived. We used them to bag up the toys for Santa to deliver with the local firefighters and they worked out much better than expected. The tags are garbage, but you can easily write on the bags with a permanent marker, which we did. They held up well for what we needed them for and are more than large enough to fill with gifts for a whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kudlik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent large gift bags
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a large, sturdy gift bag to wrap a bulky, Christmas gift. I ordered a set of these bags and was very pleased - they're really huge and very sturdy, sort of a cloth material rather than plastic. They came with a built-in draw string so you can just pull the bag closed and tie the draw string. Also came with a little gift card. The gift recipient will be able to re-use the bag if they wish for their own gift-giving. Very happy with the bags!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Peterson

customer_reviews.title: What's the point of a seethrough gift bag?
customer_reviews.text: So, these bags are cute and they were just barely large enough for the item I wanted them for. A queen sized bed set. However, the bags are not very thick and you can see through them. If I wanted to wrap or otherwise obscure the item so it couldn't be known I would not have needed these bags. Still gave them two stars because the bags seem fairly sturdy and do look as nice as Amazon's gift bags but they kind of fail in their purpose as gift bags. Thankfully the gift isn't for a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: SO nice - just wish they would carry them again!
customer_reviews.text: Needed some LARGE gift bags for this upcoming Christmas and found these while looking around on Amazon, was pleased that they were fabric and reusable. Got them in and LOVED them so much that I went back to get some more, but unfortunately was unable to find them again. Please bring them back - they are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: MoosieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.  Made for easy wrapping.
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful. I was excited to see if these held the gifts I had purchased. Unfortunately the corner of the box tore the first bag. Knowing this I carefully placed the box into the bag and made sure not to pick it up from the bottom when transporting. It worked perfectly for Christmas!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Huge and nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are huge Christmas bags but I'm excited to use them because I'm not going to be wrapping Christmas presents this year, I'm just going to put there presents in the bags and they get their bag to go through at Christmas time. I'll be able to reuse them every christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, can’t wait to see more from this company.
customer_reviews.text: i was going to make my own bags after I saw these, but I can’t make them for what I paid. The material alone would cost more than these completed bags. Then having to hand embroider designs. Would take me all year. I am going to use these as pj bags for Christmas Eve. You will be getting more than your money’s worth. I would love to see birthday bags.
customer_reviews.author: marcia virginia

customer_reviews.title: Very large. I only needed 3, but bought 6 and will save the rest for future use.
customer_reviews.text: I had several bundles of gifts for different family members. I wanted to have everything organized to drop off or mail as I planned to travel. Every time I looked at the large bags, I smiled. They are perfect. Inexpensive, colorful, with name tags to distinguish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ho Ho Ho....the easiest wrapping ever!
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags are amazing! I gifted 4 quilts this year and these bags were plenty large enough. They were so great I made the grandkids pack them all up to use next year!
customer_reviews.author: Christy M.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Sacks
customer_reviews.text: I used the Extra Large Christmas Sacks for children's bulky toys and they were perfect. The are large enough and strong enough to hold many packages. Everyone I gave them to loved them and they are re-usable....
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Okay purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are slightly see through so you have to use two bags or find a way to conceal the item better. The ribbon is great but when trying to close the bag shut, it feels like the bag will tear.
customer_reviews.author: EMD

customer_reviews.title: Good Size!
customer_reviews.text: These bags worked perfectly for me. I wrapped a large toolbox for my son in one of them and a huge battery operated dinosaur for my grandson in another. I didn't find them to be "revealing" as some said. I felt they disguised what was inside very well. I have 4 more to use and the ones I used this past Christmas will probably get reused too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as.nice as the fabric on Amazon gift bags they use.
customer_reviews.text: They are okay but are not fabric as in cloth you would expect. They are.more.like the semi disposable Kroger grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: E_HILLMAN

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAGS!!
customer_reviews.text: LARGE NICE CUTE DESIGNED BAGS TO PUT GIFTS FOR GRANDKIDS. I WAS REALLY IMPRESSED WITH THESE BAGS AND WOULD PURCHASE AGAIN.!
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Really big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am terrible at gift wrapping. Using these bags let's me put a lot in one bag. It can be reused, too. Very convenient when I'm traveling and I can't prewrap them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bags are huge
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdiness of these attractive reusable bags. They are perfect for very large gifts or for packing away the artificial Christmas tree after the season is over.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy Wrap
customer_reviews.text: These Christmas bags are huge strong & cute. I put 18-20 toys in one bag and still had room for more but the best part is I'm done with wrapping and it took less than 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great fro large baskets
customer_reviews.text: I wanted them for Christmas baskets I’m putting together. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGal

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: Very good bags. Fit $300 worth of target items in it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: V. Villa

customer_reviews.title: They will be perfect for large items but perfect for taking home
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow .....when they say giant they mean giant . They will be perfect for large items but perfect for taking home presents
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

product_meta.title: 6 Giant Christmas Gift Bags 36" x 44" Reusable Made of Durable Fabric with Ribbon and Gift Tag for Holiday Wrapping Extra Large Jumbo Huge Oversized Toys Gift Bags by Gift Boutique
product_meta.description: GIANT GIFT BAGS: Gift Boutique set of 6 Giant Christmas Gift Bags feature 3 different classic Holiday designs in red and white including A) Santa with Ho Ho Ho, B) Assorted Christmas gifts, stockings and penguins C) Assorted Christmas trees, candy cane, gingerbread etc. SUPER QUALITY: Bags are made of sturdy Fabric which makes them very durable and reusable. Hide the kid’s gifts in these bags and have them guess what’s inside. Cannot see through what’s inside. GREAT FOR LARGE OR ODD SIZED GIFTS: Perfect for large toys and big stuffed animals, these red gift sacks feature festive Holiday prints. You can also fill these giant bags with many smaller presents for a convenient way to tote gifts to a holiday party or yuletide gathering. VALUE PACK: Get 6 jumbo gift sacks at a value price! Make sure to always have some on hand when the gift giving season comes around. DIMENSIONS: Each gift sack measures 36 x 44 inches. Each bag comes with a ribbon to tie the bag and a gift tag to personalize.
feature_bullets: GIANT GIFT BAGS: Gift Boutique set of 6 Giant Christmas Gift Bags feature 3 different classic Holiday designs in red and white including A) Santa with Ho Ho Ho, B) Assorted Christmas gifts, stockings and penguins C) Assorted Christmas trees, candy cane, gingerbread etc.
SUPER QUALITY: Bags are made of sturdy Fabric which makes them very durable and reusable. Hide the kid’s gifts in these bags and have them guess what’s inside. Cannot see through what’s inside.

GREAT FOR LARGE OR ODD SIZED GIFTS: Perfect for large toys and big stuffed animals, these red gift sacks feature festive Holiday prints. You can also fill these giant bags with many smaller presents for a convenient way to tote gifts to a holiday party or yuletide gathering.
VALUE PACK: Get 6 jumbo gift sacks at a value price! Make sure to always have some on hand when the gift giving season comes around.
DIMENSIONS: Each gift sack measures 36 x 44 inches. Each bag comes with a ribbon to tie the bag and a gift tag to personalize.
